name: Giant Crab
description: A massive crustacean predator with a hard, chitinous shell and enormous pincers capable of crushing bone.
memorable: Its grappling capability can incapacitate foes, especially spellcasters, by suffocating them.
goals: Territorial defense of their nests or hunting grounds.
relations: Often encountered in groups around coastal waters and marshes.
environment: Found in coastal waters, rocky shores, and underground caves.
strengths: Fast movement on land despite its size and effective in ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Low intelligence makes it susceptible to traps and illusions.
attacks: Uses powerful pincers to crush prey and grapple enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Pincer Pinch can incapacitate and suffocate grappled creatures.
senses: The Giant Crab has blindsight which allows it to sense vibrations in water and air within 30 feet.
skills: Excels in stealth, making it a good ambusher.
additional_information: Possesses keen senses for environmental perception.
Can grapple two separate targets simultaneously.
Vulnerable due to its low charisma and wisdom scores.
Relies on its tough shell for defense in combat.
test_queries: swift giant crab in rocky shores
